attributes.action: ban forced religion in all schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To stop schools (private and state) forcing children who do not wish to, go into a religious building and go though a service. Forcing a religion on children is unfair they should make up their own minds.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
